item.title: Nginx 502 Bad Gateway
item.description: Check if php-fpm service is up Check if being listened to by nginx (for CentOS, look for “listen” in /etc/php-fpm.d/www.conf) Adjust nginx vhost (fastcgi_pass) when necessary (example below) fastcgi_pass 127.0.0.1:9000;
